messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Now recruiting millitiamen and women. Please come to HOP line to sign up

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: If you or a loved one has been diagnosed with wanting to become a stormcloak please meet us at the bridge. to sign up

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: WE HAVE A SEVERE LACK OF STORMCLOAKS! COME TO HOP LINE TO SIGN UP TODAY!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Starboard Quarter Maintenance.
